#summary This page provides information for developers
#labels Phase-Implementation

= Development Tools =

  * Java IDE: eg [http://www.eclipse.org/downloads/packages/eclipse-ide-java-ee-developers/heliossr2 Eclipse]
  * [http://www.virtualbox.org/wiki/Downloads VirtualBox 4.0.4]
  * [http://www.oracle.com/technetwork/java/javase/downloads/index.html JDK 1.6]
  * [http://tortoisesvn.net/downloads.html SVN Client]

= Setup projects =

  # Download source code from [https://educloud.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/]
  # Import projects from java IDE. For eclipse users: import -> existing projects into workspace -> select root diretory -> educloud -> select all projects -> *uncheck Copy Projects into workspace* -> finish

see also: [http://code.google.com/p/educloud/wiki/RepositoryOrganization Repository Organization]

VirtualBox 4.0.4 Oracle VM VirtualBox Extension Pack [http://download.virtualbox.org/virtualbox/4.0.4/Oracle_VM_VirtualBox_Extension_Pack-4.0.4-70112.vbox-extpack All platforms]


= Run configs = 

Name: Start Node
Project: cloudnode
Main-Class: com.google.educloud.cloudnode.App
VM arguments: -Dlog4j.configuration=conf/log4j.properties
Classpath: Add user entries->advanced->ok

Name: Start Node
Project: cloudserver
Main-Class: com.google.educloud.cloudserver.App
VM arguments: -Dlog4j.configuration=conf/log4j.properties
Classpath: Add user entries->advanced->ok
